SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHONE, BIRTH, ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER M WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET EMAIL = ? , ADDRESS = ? , PHONE = ? , BIRTH = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
